ygData.subject: RE: [shadowknight] Trolls and Freeport
ygData.msgSnippet: ... the ... Da Bastards! Heh. ... YES! Woohoo! Thanks for that update! I assume Crushbone Orcs KoS everboby. AllaKhazam says killing Eriolissi Sisters, and
ygData.messageBody:
>1) Not anymore as far as I know. You used to be able to but they removed
the
>quest.

Da Bastards! Heh.

>2)

>3) Yes, killing wood elf slaves raises indigo brotherhood faction, but
>killing high elf slaves raises The Dead faction. I personally spent 5 days
>there, many hours a day, killing those elves until I could do the quests in
>the house of the dead to raise my faction up. It took a long time but was
>worth it in the end.

YES! Woohoo! Thanks for that update! I assume Crushbone Orcs KoS everboby.
AllaKhazam says killing Eriolissi Sisters, and Jyle Windshot (assume the one
in Freeport) increase faction in Crushbone.

That gives me 3 more questions.
1) What level are the Highelf (or any for that matter) slaves?
2) What level are the Eriolissi Sisters in OOT? (lowest and what are of the
island?)
3) What level is Jyle?

Thanks in advance!

--
Cronikx
